items.sentence: Many people who hear Tom speaking French think he\'s a native speaker.
I want to go back to doing what I was doing before you interrupted me.
She handed him his jacket then opened the door and asked him to leave.
The baritone sax that Tom wanted to buy was way too expensive for him.
There is an urgent need for the local government to help the homeless.
Tom didn\'t think he\'d ever have a chance to live in another country.
Tom didn\'t want to see Mary in prison for a crime she didn\'t commit.
Tom doesn\'t need to answer any more questions if he doesn\'t want to.
Can you describe to me the difference between black tea and green tea?
The suspect was last seen wearing blue jeans and an orange sweatshirt.
